message: Let's divide fairly, I'll take a bit more
I'm feeling generous, but let's make it a bit more even. This is my counter-offer.
I'll meet you halfway between my first offer and your counter-offer
Time is running out, let's settle this. I'm moving closer to your offer, but I need a bit more.
I'm being patient, but I still think I deserve the bigger share
This is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the fairest. Take it or leave it, Alice.
